## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c1c2ce1077d3778b7ed51e8d98f9ba6a9cd57e2be0c134fe9bda021d3a10248b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@test3.svt/first-npm-package-test' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
